extracted_text:
On August 28, 2025, POWERGRID Ltd. had two significant corporate developments . The company announced a major project win in Karnataka and convened its 36th Annual General Meeting (AGM).

POWERGRID was declared the successful bidder for a new inter-state transmission system (ISTS) project in Karnataka.

The company also held its 36th AGM via video conferencing on August 26, 2025, and announced the details of the meeting on August 28.

Project purpose:The new transmission system is intended to strengthen the grid in Davanagere to integrate renewable energy generation.

Operating model:POWERGRID will develop, own, operate, and transfer the project under the Build, Own, Operate and Transfer (BOOT) model.

Official letter:The Letter of Intent (LoI) for the project was received by the company on August 27, 2025.

Key highlights:During the meeting, management reviewed the company's financial performance, operational achievements, future growth strategies, and technological initiatives.

Shareholder approval:All resolutions proposed at the AGM were approved by the shareholders.
